input.subject: Requesting move for an employee from SF to NYC
input.body:
Hey Gullie,

We would like to move one employee from SF to NYC. We have a budget of 10k for her move.
Here is her contact info:
First name: jolie
Last name: ni
phone number: 415-572-0542
email: ninan980805@gmail.com

Best,
Cluely Team

output.subject: Requesting Details for your move from SF to NYC
output.body:
Hey Jolie,

We are Gullie, your relocation assistant. We received your relocation request from Cluely and will be manageing your moving logistics.
To better assit your move, can you provide those informations for shipping your personal goods?
1. pickup address
2. pickup date
3. destination address(if don't provide, your belongs will be held at a storage unit, it will incur additional charges)
4. do you need moving boxes?
5. do you need help packing? (additional charges)
6. your consent to purchase insurance for this shipping

Best,
Gullie Agent
